00022 #ifndef CORE_H
00023 #define CORE_H
00024 
00025 #define VERSION     0x00000001  //Used for verifying the Data-Format of Loaded Files
00026 #define MAGICNUMBER 0x12345678
00027 
00028 #define WINDOW_TITLE "Qube5 Editor"
00029 #define DIMENSION 5 //Dimension of the cube
00030 #define NUM_ITEMS DIMENSION*DIMENSION*DIMENSION //Total Number of Items(LEDs)
00031 
00032 #define DEFAULT_TIME 10 //Every figure has this default time
00033 
00034 #define MAX_ALLOWED_FIGURES 1000 //Limited to 1000 Figures with ATMega32
00035 
00036 #define glError() { \
00037         GLenum err = glGetError(); \
00038         if (err != GL_NO_ERROR) { \
00039                 qDebug()<< "glError in File:" << (char*) __FILE__ << "Line " << (int) __LINE__ << ":" << (char*) gluErrorString(err); \
00040                 err = glGetError(); \
00041         } \
00042         else { \
00043                /*qDebug()<< "no glError in Line:" << (char*) __FILE__ << "Line " << (int) __LINE__ << "!"; */  \
00044         } \
00045 }
00046

00048
